definition: at or to or from a great distance in space, located at a great distance in time or space or degree
details:
adverb
- at or to or from a great distance in space
= example: at or to or from a great distance in space
- remote in time
= example: remote in time
- to a considerable degree
= synonyms: heavily, to a great extent
- at or to a certain point or degree
= example: at or to a certain point or degree
- to an advanced stage or point
= example: to an advanced stage or point
adjective
- located at a great distance in time or space or degree
= example: located at a great distance in time or space or degree
- being of a considerable distance or length
= example: being of a considerable distance or length
- beyond a norm in opinion or actions
= example: beyond a norm in opinion or actions
- being the animal or vehicle on the right or being on the right side of an animal or vehicle
= example: being the animal or vehicle on the right or being on the right side of an animal or vehicle
